remarks: The sequence of terms in the infinite sequence defining a power series for fixed ` X ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
pser.g $e |- G = ( x e. CC |-> ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ` n ) x. ( x ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
radcnv.a $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
psergf.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
psergf $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` X ) : NN0 --> CC ) $.
$d A n x $.
